Class ViewContext¶

The view context attached to this controller

Constructor¶

class ViewContext(component)¶
Arguments:
  • component –

Methods¶

getRoot¶

ViewContext#getRoot(dom)¶
Arguments:
  • dom (Boolean) – True to return the DOM element
Returns HtmlElement:
 

The component’s container element

Returns the DOM container element for the component associated with this view context.

getWebSocket¶

ViewContext#getWebSocket(url)¶
Arguments:
  • url –

Method used to obtain a web socket for which a handler was defined into this component.

publish¶

ViewContext#publish(eventName, data)¶
Arguments:
  • eventName –
  • data –

This is the method that will publish an event and will execute all registered callbacks.

subscribe¶

ViewContext#subscribe(eventName, callback)¶
Arguments:
  • eventName – Event name we want to subscribe to. Can be any string value.
  • callback –
    This is the callback method that will get executed. It must have
    a single parameter called data.

    Ex: function(data)

This is the method that allows registration of a callback method to a desired event.

unsubscribe¶

ViewContext#unsubscribe(eventName, callback)¶
Arguments:
  • eventName – Event name we want to subscribe to. Can be any string value.
  • callback –
    This is the callback method that will get executed. It must have
    a single parameter called data.

    Ex: function(data)

Unsubscribe from an event
